property.name: apex.app-param.KinesisAccessKey
property.description: Specify Access key for accessing Kinesis

property.name: apex.app-param.KinesisSecretKey
property.description: Specify Secret key for accessing Kinesis

property.name: apex.app-param.KinesisEndpoint
property.description: Specify AWS Kinesis Endpoint

property.name: apex.app-param.KinesisStreamName
property.description: Specify AWS Kinesis Stream name

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputDatabaseDriver
property.description: Specify Jdbc database driver for output database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputStoreUsername
property.description: Specify Jdbc store username for output database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputStorePassword
property.description: Specify Jdbc store password for output database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputDatabaseUrl
property.description: Specify Jdbc database URL driver for output database. E.g: jdbc:redshift://examplecluster.com:5439/dev

property.name: apex.app-param.RedshiftAccessKey
property.description: Specify Access Key for accessing S3 or EMR cluster

property.name: apex.app-param.RedshiftSecretKey
property.description: Specify Secret Key for accessing S3 or EMR cluster

property.name: apex.app-param.S3BucketName
property.description: Specify AWS S3 Bucket Name

property.name: apex.app-param.S3DirectoryName
property.description: Specify AWS S3 directory name

property.name: apex.app-param.batchSizeForJdbcOutput
property.description: Specify the batch size for Jdbc Output.

property.name: apex.app-param.maxLengthOfRollingFile
property.description: Specify the maximum length of rolling file in bytes. For eg: 134217728 (1MB)

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputTableName
property.description: Specify Jdbc output table name for output database. E.g: test_event_output_table

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForJdbcOutput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for jdbc output.

property.name: apex.app-param.EmrClusterId
property.description: Specify EMR cluster Id.

property.name: apex.app-param.RegionOfInputFile
property.description: Specify AWS region from where the input file resides.

property.name: apex.app-param.RedshiftDelimiter
property.description: Specify delimiter for Redshift.

property.name: apex.app-param.RedshiftReaderMode
property.description: Specify reader mode for Redshift. By default, it load files from S3 into Redshift table. If the file is located in EMR, then specify "READ_FROM_EMR" mode
